root.message: The FREQ_COLL field for indicator 14-3-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: National data sets should be reported annually (at the least), following the request by IOC Circular letters. However, experts, national focal points of Member States and NODCs are invited to submit data throughout the year via the SDG 14.3.1 data portal. The invitation via a Circular Letter will be sent during the second semester of each year.
